title: Daily Telescope: A dazzling view of the Milky Way from southern Africa
summary: "I finally had 30 minutes or so to admire the spectacular view."

title: Kuva Space raises 16.6 million euros
summary: With the investment, Kuva Space will accelerate development of cameras and related technology for its hyperspectral satellite constellation.

title: Starship Another Step Closer to Second Test Flight
summary: SpaceX’s Starship is another step closer today to getting an FAA license to attempt a second orbital flight test. The FAA announced the company has completed all the required corrective […]

title: Ovzon gets another deadline extension to deploy first GEO satellite
summary: International regulators have given Ovzon another six months to provide services from its debut satellite following a series of manufacturing and launch delays for the project, the Swedish satcoms provider announced Oct. 31.

title: FAA completes safety review for next Starship launch
summary: SpaceX is one step closer to getting an updated license for its next Starship launch but must still wait for the completion of an environmental review.
